text: Actually Megaman 9 exceeded the maximum possible space of an NES cart. at least without heavy modding to the internals
author: AzuriteShift

text: Technically 9 wasn't on the N.E.S., but it practically was, because it was made with the N.E.S.'s abilities. Graphics, sound, everything. Except the N.E.S. didn't have access to the internet. And some technical stuff, like N.E.S. would flicker and glitch a lot... :/ Megaman 9 & 10 look and play exactly like N.E.S. games, with no improvement on graphics or anything.
